oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Eveready flashlight
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This flashlight was owned by James McFerren Johnston who served in the Headquarters Company of the 30th Division during World War I. Stamped on the bottom of the flashlight is "EVERREADY/ Pat. Dec. 17, 1912/ OTHER PATS. PENDING." James McFerren Johnston served in HQ Co., Ord. Corps, attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div. The 30th Div. consisted of National Guard units from Tennessee and the Carolinas and nicknamed "Old Hickory."
